ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var sid = java.get('sid');
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) { sid = String(book.bookUrl).match(/\d{3,}$/);}

cache.deleteMemory('pxcjj'); //仅通过正文打开详情，防错
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	let bkn = String(book.name);
	let id = java.hexDecodeToString(result).match(/\d+$/)[0];
	Info['书名'] = '';
	cache.put('pxsid','');
	Info['章节'] = bkn;
	cache.put('pxid',id);
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	let length = leng(bkn);	
book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','#').replace(']','\n\n'):'') + (length>18?('《'+book.name+'》\n'):'') + java.get('jianjie');
	rr='1';

} else {
let url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v2/novel/series?series_id=' + sid;
//修正bookurl
book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{"type":"px"}`;

try {

jg = java.connect(gethd(url));
rr = jg.body();
if (jg.code() == 400) {
	source.login();
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(500);
	rr = java.ajax(gethd(url));
	}

} catch(err) {
	rr={};
	java.toast('详情页链接加载失败'+sid);
	}

//设置解析结果
java.setContent(rr);


//更新更新时间
try {
let tm = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.create_date');
let d = new Date(tm);
d = java.timeFormatUTC(d,'yy/MM/dd',8*60*60*1000);
book.kind = String(book.kind).replace(/\d+\/\d+\/\d+|$/,d).replace('null','');
} catch(err) {java.toast('详情页内容错误');}

//获取书名并净化
let bkn = String(java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.title')).replace(/^《(.+)》$/,'$1');
book.name = bkn.replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');

//java.log('┌获取书名\n[99:99.999] └'+book.name);

//获取书名失败
if (book.name == '') {
	//效果，unicode转字符
	// let ee = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(rr) );
	let txte = java.getString('$..user_message',rr);
	//弹出提示，sid相应序列不存在
	java.longToast('\n未获取到书名\n'+txte);
	} else {
	
	//放入书名
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Info['书名'] = book.name;
	cache.put('pxsid',sid);
	Info['章节'] = '';
	cache.put('pxid','');
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	
	//同名共存
	if (source.get('gc') == 1) book.name='📘'+book.name;
	}

//补充封面链接
if (book.coverUrl == null) {
	let img = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.image_urls.large');
	book.coverUrl = gethdi(img);
		
//java.log('┌获取封面\n[99:99.999] └'+book.coverUrl);
}

//计算书名长度
let length = leng(String(book.name));
//大于18个全角字符
if (length > 18) length= '《'+String(book.name).replace(/^📘/,'')+'》\n';
else length = '';
let jianjie = java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.caption');
book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','#').replace(']','\n\n'):'') + length + java.get('jianjie');
java.put('jianjie',jianjie);
java.put("bookr",rr);
}

rr
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('http://127.0') ) {
	rr = [{}];
	} else {
let nurl = java.getString('$.next_url');
if (nurl == '') {
	java.toast('发现页到底了');
	source.put('nurl','http://127.0.0.1');
	}
else {
	source.put('nurl',nurl);
	}
if (baseUrl.includes('/watchlist/novel') ) {
	rr = java.getElement("$.series");
	} else { rr = java.getElement("$.novels");}

}
rr
</js>
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
let id = java.getString('$.id');
let sid = java.getString('$.series.id');
let rr = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/webview/v2/novel?id=' + id;

if (baseUrl.includes('/watchlist/novel') ) {
	sid = id;
	if (source.get('gc')=='1') book.name='📘'+book.name;
}
else if (sid=='') {sid='🇨🇳';}
else {
	let jj = java.get('jianjie');
	java.put('jianjie',book.name+'\n'+jj);
}
java.put('sid',sid);
`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(rr)},{"type":"px"}`
</js>
ruleExplore.intro:
<js>
let jj = java.get('jianjie');
let rr = '\n' + java.getString('$.caption');
let rs = java.htmlFormat(rr);
java.put('jianjie',rs);
jj + rs
</js>

ruleSearch.author:
<js>
{{(source.ruleExplore.author).replace('@js:','')}}
</js>
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
page=cache.getFromMemory('pxpage');
cache.deleteMemory('pxpage');
if (baseUrl.startsWith('http://127.')) {rr = [{}];}

else {
rr = java.getElement('$.novels');
nurl = java.getString('$.next_url');
if (rr.length<6&&page==1&&nurl!='') {
	//处理不触发下一页且有nurl的情况
	sleep(500);
	rs = java.ajax(gethd(nurl));
	java.setContent(rs)
	rrr = java.getElement('$.novels');
	//合并对象函数，可直接用
	rr.addAll(rrr);
	nurl = java.getString('$.next_url');
}

if (nurl == '') {
	java.toast('搜索页到底了');
	source.put('nurls','http://127.0.0.1');
	} else {source.put('nurls',nurl);}

}
rr
</js>

if (sid=='') {

	} else {
	let jj = java.get('jianjie');
	java.put('jianjie',book.name+'\n'+jj);
	}
let rr = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/webview/v2/novel?id=' + id;
java.put('sid',sid);
`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(rr)},{"type":"px"}`
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let sid = java.get('sid');
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {result=[result];}
else {
	try {
		let url = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
		//下一页会报错，直接跳过
let bookr=java.get('bookr')+'';
if (!bookr) {
	let rs=java.connect(gethd(url));
	if (rs.code() == 400) {
		source.login();
		sleep(500);
		rs=java.connect(gethd(url));}
bookr=rs.body();}
		java.setContent(bookr);
		java.put('bookr',''); //保证单目录时进行刷新
		} catch(e){}
result = java.getElement('$.novels');
}
result
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
let sid = java.get('sid');
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {cc=book.name;}
else {
let title = java.getString('$.title');
title = String(title).replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');
let bkn=String(book.name).replace(/^📘|[。？！]+$/g,'');
//消除后不剩字则不消除
cc = title.replace(bkn,'♸').replace(/[《【]♸[。？！]*[】》]\s*|♸[。？！\s]*/,'')||title;
	}
if (source.get('xh')==1) {
	cc='▫️'+cc;
}
	cc
</js>
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let sid = java.get('sid');
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
		uu=java.hexDecodeToString(result);
		book.putCustomVariable('这是单贴，链接：'+uu);
	}
else {
let id = java.getString('$.id');
uu='https://app-api.pixiv.net/webview/v2/novel?id=' + id;
}
gethd(uu);
</js>
ruleToc.formatJs: title.replace(/^▫️(?![第序]|#?第?[\d零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+[章回])/,'第'+index+'章 ').replace(/^▫️/,'');

searchUrl:
<js>
if (page == 1) {
cache.putMemory('pxpage',page);
		if (/^\u200b/.test(key)) {
			let uid = cache.getFromMemory('pxuid');
			if (uid=='') java.longToast('\n请刷新书籍');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id=' + uid;}
		else if (key.startsWith('作者@')) {
			let uid = key.slice(3);
			if (!/^\d{3,}$/.test(uid)) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的id');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id='+uid;	}
		else if (/\d{5,}$/.test(key) ) {
			let sid = key.match(/\d+$/)[0];
			java.put('sid',sid);
			if (key.startsWith('作者')) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的搜索格式');
			else url = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(sid)},{"type":""}`;}
		else if (key.startsWith('正文@')) {
			url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&sort=date_desc&search_target=text&word='+key.slice(3);}
		else { url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&word='+key;}
source.put('nurls','http://127.0.0.1'); //重置储存的下一页

} else {url = source.get('nurls');}
gethd(url)
</js>
